name: Winter Thief
description:
Project Winter Thief

Story: The boy was just merely a cheerful kid in his orphanage until the government won’t support the orphanage any longer. The orphanage had to be taken down, his other friends are taken somewhere else while he got left behind without a name.  Now he's all alone out there somewhere.. Will you help the kid?

Gameplay: Only offers one mode, where the player have to make the character survive.
